languages.text: "Если тебе что-то понадобится в будущем, обращайся ко мне напрямую — я всегда выслушаю".
"If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."
languages.original_text: "Если тебе что-то понадобится в будущем, обращайся ко мне напрямую — я всегда выслушаю".

traits.locale_text: "If ever you need anything, bring it straight to me; I will hear you out."
"If ever you need anything, bring it straight to me; I will hear you out."
"If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."
"If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

languages.text: 「何か要るなら、直接俺のところに来い。話くらいなら聞いてやる」
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: 「何か要るなら、直接俺のところに来い。話くらいなら聞いてやる。」

languages.text: «Si necesitas cualquier cosa, acude directamente a mí. Escucharé lo que tengas que decirme».
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: «Si necesitas cualquier cosa, acude directamente a mí. Escucharé lo que tengas que decirme».

languages.text: “如果需要什么，直接来找我就好，我会听你把话说完。”
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: “如果需要什么，直接来找我就好，我会听你把话说完。”

languages.text: "Falls Ihr je etwas braucht, kommt direkt zu mir. Ich werde Euch anhören."
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr je etwas braucht, kommt direkt zu mir. Ich werde Euch anhören."

languages.text: « S'il vous faut quoi que ce soit, venez directement me voir. Je vous écouterai. »
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: « S'il vous faut quoi que ce soit, venez directement me voir. Je vous écouterai. »

languages.text: "Bir şeye ihtiyacın olursa doğruca bana gel. Seni dinlerim."
languages.original_text: "If ever you need anything, come straight to me. I will hear you out."

traits.locale_text: "Bir şeye ihtiyacın olursa doğruca bana gel. Seni dinlerim."
